columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the nat gateway.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Contains ID to identify a nat gateway uniquely.

columns.name: etag
columns.description: An unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

columns.name: idle_timeout_in_minutes
columns.description: The idle timeout of the nat gateway.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The provisioning state of the nat gateway resource.

columns.name: resource_guid
columns.description: The provisioning state of the nat gateway resource.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The resource type of the nat gateway.

columns.name: public_ip_addresses
columns.description: An array of public ip addresses associated with the nat gateway resource.

columns.name: public_ip_prefixes
columns.description: An array of public ip prefixes associated with the nat gateway resource.

columns.name: subnets
columns.description: An array of references to the subnets using this nat gateway resource.

columns.name: zones
columns.description: A list of availability zones denoting the zone in which Nat Gateway should be deployed.
